page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is not a lot of employment available in this area, because there are not many industries. However, there are several farms in our area which provide work for some people. In the nearby town of Axminster there are two main employers; the carpet factory, which is world-famous, and Shands. Axminster Carpet Factory makes good quality carpets which are sent all over the country and exported,too. Shands Factory makes print for typewriters, computers, cash registers, credit and identity cards. There is also work in shops and offices, of course, and there is quite a lot of seasonal work available in the summer because of the influx of holiday-makers.
